name: QuickHat
description:
Hey. This is the firts game I've ever made and I want to  to re make it.

But I need feedback.  Can you help me pelase? 

I've been 3 years in university (and i have 3 more left).  I'm really passionate about game development. So any help you could give me would be extremely useful. I would like to learn about user experience and level design. So if you know anything about it, I would apressiate it.

Thank you !!!

I need to pay my studies so donations are also accepted. <3 #hugAStressedStudent
